item.description:
Halloween Weekend is a lot of fun in the Mt. Washington Valley area. The fall foliage will still be in bloom and the scent of the crisp fall air means that ski season is on the way!

We'd love for you to join us for our Member and Guest Appreciation weekend.

Including:
Friday night welcome social
Friday and Saturday lodging
Saturday and Sunday Continental Breakfast
Saturday lunch
Saturday evening pizza party
Saturday Night Halloween costume social - so be creative

The cost for the weekend is $50 for guests and $22 for members for all of the above (plus any additional cost for optional activities below).

Credit card payments are available via Paypal for a slight convenience charge. If you prefer this method, advance payment is required. Please advise so I may send you an invoice.

Optional Valley Activities:
Infamous Fiddler's Green event on Saturday (email for more details)
Foliage Hikes
Cranmore Ghoullog
Shopping at the Outlets

Looking forward to seeing you all for a spooktacular time!

Please let me know if you have any questions!

group.name: Innitou Ski Runners & Rider's Activities Club of New England

item.name: Spend Halloween With the Innitous for Member & Guest Appreciation Weekend!
